full_description:
Hoco ES67 Bluetooth Wireless Neckband

The Hoco ES67 Bluetooth Wireless Neckband offers an enhanced audio experience with its Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity, ensuring a stable connection and minimizing lag for seamless use with your device. The magnetic adsorption feature allows the earbuds to attach when not in use, preventing them from getting misplaced. With an IPX5 water resistance rating, these headphones can endure splashes of water and sweat, making them ideal for use during workouts or outdoor activities. The HD audio quality delivers clear and crisp sound with a well-balanced soundstage, enhancing the overall listening experience. Extended usage is ensured by the lengthy battery life, which can last up to 20 hours on a single charge. These neckband headphones are made even more convenient by the integrated microphone, which allows for hands-free calling. When looking for comfortable, long-lasting Bluetooth headphones with a long battery life, the Hoco ES67 Wireless Neckband is a dependable option. Its versatility makes it ideal for a range of sports, including running, exercise, and outdoor activities.

full_description:
Hoco ES58 Sound Tide Wireless Earphone with Mic

The Hoco ES58 SoundTide Manner Wireless Earphone features Bluetooth 5.0. This earphone's battery capacity is 200 mAh. It charges for around 2 hours, talks/music time of 15 hours, and a standby time of 200 hours. It features a 98-inch cord and weighs 18 g. It supports Chinese and English prompt tones; double-click the multi-function button while earbuds are not linked to hearing a prompt sound. The Hoco ES58 Sound Tide Wireless Earphone comes with no warranty.

full_description:
Hoco ES62 Pretty Dual Play Mode Neckband Bluetooth Earphone

The Hoco ES62 Pretty Dual Play Mode Bluetooth Earphone has a BT v5.3 and an 800 mAh battery with 120 hours of use time and 1200 hours of standby, giving the user a lot of time to enjoy using it. English instructions to double-click the multi-function key in unpaired mode are supported by the Hoco Bluetooth headphone, which also enables BT and TF card (32 GB) playback. The wireless earbuds' fast charging time is only 2.5 hours, and their backup time, when used randomly, is 120 hours. The Hoco ES62 Pretty comes with no warranty.

Hoco ES61 Manner Wireless Earphones with Mic

The Hoco ES61 Manner Wireless Earphone has Bluetooth 5.1 and the Chip JL AC7006. The battery capacity of this earphone is 200mAh. It charges for roughly 2 hours, talks/music time of 20 hours, and a standby time of 330 hours. It has an 85-inch cable and weighs 22g.
